title: Love Island's Amber Gill looks so different with straight hair at clothing launch
text:

Amber Gill made sure all eyes were on her for the eagerly anticipated launch of her first clothing range.

The Love Island beauty has been biding her time as her co-stars released their collections with various retailers over the last few months. So when her time in the spotlight came, she was determined to shine.

Amber, 22, showed off her style transformation as she arrived at her star-studded Miss Pap party in a sparkling mini dress and tumbling straight locks.

Ahead of the bash, Amber posed up a storm on the red carpet after switching up her blonde curls for a jet black weave that flowed down to her waist.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

(Image: SplashNews.com)

(Image: Instagram)

Geordie lass Amber said she helped designed her latest collection, which comes in sizes 6-26, to be as inclusive as possible.

"Having something for everyone really means a lot to me," she told the Mail Online.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

(Image: SplashNews.com)

Many of Amber's villa pals turned out to support her on her big night, including close pals Anna Vakili and Yewande Biala.

Molly Mae Hague even turned out with Tommy Fury, putting to bed rumours of a feud between her and her co-stars.

20-year-old influencer Molly was looking sharp in an all white suit and matching handbag.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

(Image: SplashNews.com)

(Image: SplashNews.com)

Wearing her blonde locks scraped back into a tight bun, Molly Mae worked a serious pout on the red carpet, while looking like she meant business in her shoulder-padded blazer.

She was later joined by her beau Tommy Fury, who was more than happy to let his girlfriend take the limelight.

The boxer showed up in a simple black trousers and white shirt combo.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

Molly had caused a stir earlier this week after appearing to snub Anna Vakili's shoe launch.

Anna had invited Molly to party with her sister Mandi and their former reality TV stars but the blonde beauty raised eyebrows by failing to attend.

But Anna later insisted there was no bad blood between them.

"There is no feud we are friends. Fake news all the time," she fired.
description: The Love Island beauty switched up her trademark blonde curls in favour of sleek black extensions for her clothing launch party
